text: Al Hudaydah is a city in western Yemen on the Red Sea. It is one of Yemen's most important ports. It is the capital of Al Hudaydah Governorate. As of 2004, the population was 402,560. == References == Category:Cities in Yemen Category:Settlements in Al Hudaydah Governorate Category:Port cities in the Arabian Peninsula Category:Port cities and towns of the Red Sea
title: Al Hudaydah
